runs.comm: good length first up, Dilshan has a go at it and gets an inside edge on the leg side
fuller ball from over the wicket on middle stump, Jayasuriya moves forward and pushes towards the bowler
good line and length from Sammy, no room outside off stump, Jayasuriya steers towards point

quick single, risky single! Jayasuriya dabs the ball towards the off side and sprints, Marshall runs in from cover but fails to pick up, Jayasuriya was gone if he had picked up and hit at the bowler's end
Dilshan drives and picks up a less risky single
good start from Sammy, he pitches slightly shorter and angles the ball across the left-hander, Jayasuriya tries to pull but misses
short of a length on middle and leg, Dilshan tucks the ball towards square leg
full and straight, block hole stuff from Taylor, Jayasuriya can't do much about that and plays it to the bowler
driven firmly off the front foot but Jayasuriya doesn't beat the infield
short ball angles into the left-hander from round the wicket, Jayasuriya gets cramped for room while pulling but manages to get a single after hitting the ball on to his body
bowled Jerome! Full ball slanting into the block hole again, Dilshan leans across and keeps it out
superb finish to a superb over, Jayasuriya blocks another yorker towards the bowler
He was going to play the scoop there, he was!  Dilshan moved across, got into position, and then realised he wasn't going to be able to do it. He ended up defending the ball
finally he breaks loose! Jayasuriya charges and pulls over mid-on, the outfield is super quick and that';s the first boundary of the match
full toss but Jayasuriya misses out by driving straight to mid-off
slower ball, Jayasuriya plays it to point
another slower ball, Jayasuriya is early on the pull and misses the ball
Jayasuriya charges again but has to reach out to play the ball towards cover, he runs another risky single but the fielder at cover misses at the bowler's end

more slow stuff from the West Indian bowlers, Taylor slants a short slow ball towards the left-hander from round the wicket, Jayasuriya misses the pull, he's not happy with his bat and has called for a replacement
he's nearly been caught! Jayasuriya tried to pull again, was cramped for room again, and lobbed the ball tamely on the leg side, both bowler and keeper went for it but neither could reach it
Jayasuriya backs away towards leg side, Taylor sees him go and bowls the ball as far outside off as he can without it being a wide, Jayasuriya can't reach it, he's getting restless out there
played off the pads behind square for one
now what was that? Taylor bowled a slower short ball, Dilshan was shaping up to pull but realised that he was early on the shot, he waited for the ball and tipped it over the keeper's head for four

low full toss from Taylor, Dilshan moves across, bends down low and paddles the ball towards fine leg, the ball bounces on the boundary line and it's the first six of the match! Not quite the scoop but every bit as effective, he picked that up from middle stump
dabbed off the back foot towards the off side
Bravo pitches one in the block hole, Dilshan stays in his crease and defends on the off side
full ball outside off stump, Dilshan winds up and slashes hard, sending the ball flying over point, it speeds to the boundary
and again! This time it's slower but Dilshan waits before cutting in the air but just wide of the fielder at point, Bravo thinks he had a chance there
played towards the leg side
bang! Dilshan's drilled a full ball down the ground, he's up and away already, Sri Lanka need Sanath to join him
and Jayasuriya goes after him, smacking the flat ball through the gap at midwicket
quicker ball, Jayasuriya charges but gets a bottom edge
sun's out for a moment ... Dilshan pushes a fast ball towards point
pushed off the front foot towards long on for one
that's a nice friendly full toss but Jayasuriya mis-times the pull to long on
Dilshan moves back in his crease and nudges the ball on the leg side
he gets the ball to turn into the right-hander, Dilshan misses it and gets hit on the pad
Jayasuriya tries to sweep Gayle, bowling from round the wicket, but misses
that's really quick outside off stump, Jayasuriya tries to cut but is beaten for pace
swept towards square leg
Dilshan cuts towards third man for two, he placed that wide of the fielder
Gayle finishes with a dot ball, Dilshan tried to cut late but was beaten
Jayasuriya pulls but straight to short fine leg
loud appeal for lbw after Jayasuriya misses the pull and gets hit on the pad, that looked very close, it pitched just in line and hit him in front of middle
defended once again, he's just not hitting it well today
played towards the leg side for one
Dilshan cuts the ball towards point to bring up the 50 partnership
that's Jayasuriya's 19th dot ball!! He hits a full toss straight towards cover
Dilshan waits and waits before nudging the ball fine past short third man, he used the pace beautifully, he's in lovely touch
gone gone gone! Dilshan launches the ball over midwicket, he's connected with the slog sweep superbly and cleared the boundary
played to short fine leg
Jayasuriya works the ball behind square for two ...
Jayasuriya tries to play the reverse sweep but misses, he's looking desperate now
worked off the pads towards square leg for one
Is this bat working? Jayasuriya steps down and swats the ball flat wide of the fielder on the long-on boundary ... he hit that hard
dabbed on the off side for a single
Dilshan backs away to cut and hits it firmly, Simmons fumbles at point and concedes a second
played off the back foot towards long on for a single
fast ball, Jayasuriya gets beaten while swinging across the line
yorker, and Jayasuriya does well to keep it out
Dilshan drives the first one towards cover
Dilshan fishes out the reverse sweep but doesn't make proper contact
it's finally over! Jayasuriya's struggle has ended at the Oval, he moved across his stumps and chipped a ball which angled into him towards short fine leg, Taylor took an easy catch
good length ball on off stump, Sangakkara pushes on the off side and thinks about a single, Bravo is too quick

blinder at point! An absolute blinder! The ball was full and wide, Sangakkara came out of his crease and slashed hard, he hit it well and sent the ball racing towards Pollard who reacted superbly, he jumped to take a sharp catch above his head
played off the back foot on the leg side
that's too wide outside off stump
short and wide outside off stump, Jayawardene slashes the ball in the air but it bounces before reaching third man
Dilshan flicks a full ball from middle stump through midwicket

another wicket down! They're hitting it straight to fielders! Pollard bowled a full ball on leg side, it was a loose delivery and there to be hit, Jayawardene flicked it but in the air and straight to short fine leg, Chanders barely had to move
driven off the front foot to cover
slower ball, driven to cover again
short of a length angling into the right-hander, defended on the back foot, only three off the over
cut off the back foot towards deep point
played towards point once again, can't find the gap
wide ball outside off stump, Dilshan cuts towards deep point to bring up his fifty
pushed towards cover off the back foot
Silva walks down the pitch, Sammy sees him and bowls a bouncer, Silva tries to hook but is beaten
tight line and length on off stump, played off the back foot towards cover
full ball angling into the right-hander, pushed towards long on for one, they run a quick second in the end
played back to the bowler, terrific ball in the block hole
full toss and Dilshan pulls it into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary, lovely placement, he's got to do it for Sri Lanka
and again, another loose full toss on leg stump and Dilshan chips it wide of the fielder at short fine leg
driven off the front foot to cover
nudged off the pads towards square leg
Sammy hits the blockhole and not even Dilshan can get that one away
another yorker, another dot ball, Dilshan does well to keep it out
driven to long on for one
length ball, Silva gets down on one knee and pulls over short fine leg, he's finally off the mark
another single, gives Dilshan the strike
another ball in the blockhole, Dilshan plays towards long off for one
tries to swing it through the leg side but can only managed a bottom edge to midwicket
good inswinging yorker, right at the base of the stumps and Silva can only punch it out to cover to bring up the 100
gets away with this one as Taylor drags it down short outside off, but Dilshan flashes hard and misses his connection
a valuable boundary, it was a low full toss at the stumps and Dilshan managed to open the face and drive hard through backward point with real power and placement
gets underneath this one and hoicks it away over square leg, doesn't place it wide enough of the fielder but can scamper back for a second
another top shot, driven hard through the covers but an excellent save on the cover boundary by Marshall prevents the four...West Indies need to keep their standards high
full ball on off and middle, Silva moves across and hits towards long on
slash! Four! The Dilshan juggernaut rolls on, he picks up the length early and throws his bat at a full and wide ball, slicing it over point
and how he plays the slog sweep, fine leg can't run around in time, the ball beats his desperate dive, another boundary!
terrible ball! Dilshan keeps Sri Lanka going but pulling a full toss to the square leg boundary, what an effort from the dynamo, can he get 100?
yorker, and Dilshan plays it on the off side
Silva! He moves towards the off side and then heaves the ball towards the backward square leg boundary
Dilshan backs away, Benn follows him, Dilshan cuts to point to bring up the 50 partnership

caught! Silva tries to play the reverse-hit, Benn bowls a quicker ball outside the off stump, Ramdin collects the ball and appeals immediately, confident that Silva's edged it, Benn is late to join in, Aleem Dar takes his time but eventually nods his head
Mubarak gets off the mark in some style, opening the face of the bat late to guide the ball past third man
full toss on leg stump, Mubarak works the ball off his pads towards square leg
fast ball outside off, Dilshan cuts but is beaten
close call! Ramdin whips off the bails after Dilshan misses another quicker ball but the back foot is grounded, sharp work from the keeper
Mubarak walks down the pitch but has to duck out of the way of a short ball from Taylor
full and wide outside off stump, Mubarak drives it through point, they'll get two

that's some catch! Mubarak pulled the short ball high in the air towards deep midwicket, Sammy misjudged it initially but recovered in time, he sprinted in, covering lots of ground with his long strides before diving forward at full length to catch the ball inches off the ground
Dilshan swings but gets an inside edge behind square
slower ball outside off stump, pushed to cover for one
Dilshan moves into the 90s! He gets a full ball and simply swings the bat hard to dispatch it towards the backward square leg boundary
Gayle starts the final over with a leg side wide, they run a single too, Dilshan has the strike
fast ball on leg stump, Dilshan swings towards short fine leg, he won't get more than a single ...oh but he does! The throw to Gayle is poor and Dilshan sprints back
pulled to deep midwicket, only one this time, the throw is accurate
Mathews gets going! It's too full and on leg stump, Mathews makes room and hammers the ball over deep midwicket for six
full again and another boundary! Mathews drives the low full toss to the straight boundary
better length from Gayle, Mathews plays on the leg side for one
He goes for it! Charging down the track to hit the ball towards wide long on, he hasn't got enough elevation though and gets only two, fantastic innings, a complete one-man show
